meshIneBits.patterntemplates

Class ClassicBrickPattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • meshIneBits.patterntemplates.PatternTemplate
      • meshIneBits.patterntemplates.ClassicBrickPattern

  • public class ClassicBrickPattern
extends PatternTemplate
    Simplest pattern possible: a grid with a rotation of 90Â° 1 layer on 2. There is no auto-optimization implemented in this class.

      • moveBit

        public Vector2 moveBit(Pattern actualState,
                       Vector2 bitKey,
                       Vector2 localDirection)
        Description copied from class: PatternTemplate
        Move the bit by the minimum distance automatically calculated. The distance depends on the chosen pattern. Realize the move on the input pattern.
        Specified by:
        moveBit in class PatternTemplate
        Parameters:
        actualState - the actual state of layer which is paved by this pattern template
        bitKey - the transformed origin of bit
        localDirection - the direction in the coordinate system of bit
        Returns:
        the new origin of the moved bit

      • moveBit

        public Vector2 moveBit(Pattern actualState,
                       Vector2 bitKey,
                       Vector2 localDirection,
                       double distance)
        Description copied from class: PatternTemplate
        Similar to PatternTemplate.moveBit(Pattern, Vector2, Vector2) except the distance is free to decide.
        Specified by:
        moveBit in class PatternTemplate
        Parameters:
        actualState - the actual state of layer which is paved by this pattern template
        bitKey - the transformed origin of bit
        localDirection - the direction in the coordinate system of bit
        distance - an positive real number (in double precision)
        Returns:
        the new origin of the moved bit
        See Also:
        PatternTemplate#moveBit(Pattern, Vector2, Vector2)}
